ch.phonon.drawables

Class DrawableComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.drawables.DrawableComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrawableCircularStar, DrawableCoordinateSystem, DrawableDiamondStar, DrawableScaleReference, DrawableStar

    public class DrawableComposite
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    The DrawableComposite class allows to group Drawables to one Drawable, what allows to construct more complex shapes. It fulfills the contract of a normal Drawable. The contains(int, int) function checks if one of the Drawables contains the point.
    Author:
    phonon

      • remove

        @Deprecated
public void remove(Drawable drawable)
        Deprecated. 
        This function removes by reference not by value, when the Drawables do not implement the equals method. Maybe we should add a index based removing to avoid problems. Or we organize the DrawableComposite in a Map and choose the Drawable by key name.
        Parameters:
        drawable -

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D graphicsContext,
         java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transformation)
        Description copied from interface: Drawable
        paints the Drawable into the graphicsContext. The transformation provided in the signature represents the deviation from the identity matrix.
        Specified by:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int x,
               int y)
        Description copied from interface: Drawable
        Checks if the Drawable contains the coordinate (x,y) in the temView space
        Specified by:
        contains in interface Drawable
        Returns:
        is true, when it (x,y) is contained in Drawable of the active state (most of the time the state that is drawn into the view)
